CodeBlockMethod.Name: get_rank
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local rank_data = _DataStorageService:GetGlobalDataStorage("RANK")
local call_back = function(error,key,value) if (value == nil) then return end local rank_DB = {} local list = _UtilLogic:StringToTable(value) for k,v in pairs(list) do local tem = {k,v} table.insert(rank_DB,tem) end table.sort(rank_DB,function(a,b) return a[2]>b[2] end) self.DB = rank_DB end rank_data:GetAsync("RANKING",call_back)
wait(5) for id = 1, 10,1 do self.top10_list[math.floor(id)] = string.format("%d 등 유저 : %s 유저의 점수 : %d",math.floor(id),self.DB[math.floor(id)][1],self.DB[math.floor(id)][2]) end
--self:print_rank()

CodeBlockMethod.Name: update_rank
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local rank_data = _DataStorageService:GetGlobalDataStorage("RANK")
local call_back = function(error,key,value) if (value == nil) then return end local rank_DB = {} local list = _UtilLogic:StringToTable(value)
list[user] = score rank_data:SetAsync("RANKING",_UtilLogic:TableToString(list),function () end) end rank_data:GetAsync("RANKING",call_back)

CodeBlockMethod.Name: print_rank
CodeBlockMethod.Code: wait(5) self.Top1.TextComponent.Text = self.top10_list[1] self.Top2.TextComponent.Text = self.top10_list[2] self.Top3.TextComponent.Text = self.top10_list[3] self.Top4.TextComponent.Text = self.top10_list[4] self.Top5.TextComponent.Text = self.top10_list[5] self.Top6.TextComponent.Text = self.top10_list[6] self.Top7.TextComponent.Text = self.top10_list[7] self.Top8.TextComponent.Text = self.top10_list[8] self.Top9.TextComponent.Text = self.top10_list[9] self.Top10.TextComponent.Text = self.top10_list[10]

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local rank_data = _DataStorageService:GetGlobalDataStorage("RANK") local user_id = {"a","b","c","d","e","f","g","h","i","j"} local scores = {98,99,97,64,45,44,34,33,32,131} local tem_table = {} local callback = function(errorcode, key) --log(key.."값이 저장됨") end
for id = 1, 10, 1 do tem_table[user_id[id]] = scores[id] end rank_data:SetAsync("RANKING",_UtilLogic:TableToString(tem_table),callback)

CodeBlockMethod.Name: ELO
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local win_score = (win_score1 + win_score2)/2 local lose_score = (loser_score1+loser_score2)/2 local win_prab = 1/(10^((win_score - lose_score)/400) + 1) local lose_prab = 1 - win_prab local win1 = win_score1 + 10*lose_prab local win2 = win_score2 + 10*lose_prab local lose1 = loser_score1 - 10*win_prab local lose2 = loser_score2 - 10*win_prab
self:update_rank(win1,winner1) self:update_rank(win2,winner2) self:update_rank(lose1,loser1) self:update_rank(lose2,loser2)

CodeBlockMethod.Name: search_rank
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local rank_data = _DataStorageService:GetGlobalDataStorage("RANK") local data local call_back = function(error,key,value) if (value == nil) then return end local rank_DB = {} local list = _UtilLogic:StringToTable(value)
data = list[user] end rank_data:GetAsync("RANKING",call_back) wait(5) return tonumber(data)

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleKeyDownEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local key = event.key -------------------------------------------------------- if(key == KeyboardKey.Space and self.is_near == true) then self:get_rank() self.RankingUI.Enable = true end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleTriggerEnterEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local TriggerBodyEntity = event.TriggerBodyEntity -------------------------------------------------------- if(_UserService.LocalPlayer.Name == TriggerBodyEntity.Name) then self.is_near = true end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleTriggerLeaveEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code:
-- Parameters local TriggerBodyEntity = event.TriggerBodyEntity -------------------------------------------------------- if(_UserService.LocalPlayer.Name == TriggerBodyEntity.Name) then
self.is_near = false end
